name: The Night World (FNaF Fan Game)
description:
WARNING! The game is currently in the demo phase at the moment. There will only be the first part of the game which is about an hour long (yep, that's alot...) so stay tuned for the full version! I will post updates for the game's development on the game's devlog.

You are a security guard hired to protect the Fazbear Theater during the nightshift. What could go wrong?

Click to move, SPACE to interact, ENTER to sound alarm, use fan to lower temperature. Game auto-saves every few minutes. Use your save code to set the time of the night for the next time you play.

This might be the hardest FNaF Fan Game ever.

Music by FesliyanStudios, graphics by me, sound effects by me, FNaF by Scott Cawthon.

Made on Scratch
